```{r}
# Loading Libraries

library(data.table)
library(tidyverse)
library(modelsummary)
library(fixest)
library(caret)
library(skimr)
library(grid)
library(glmnet)
library(cowplot)
library(ggplot2)

#Loading the data
df <- fread("https://osf.io/4ay9x/download")
```
```{r}
## 0800 - Accountants and auditors
occ <- df[, .(count = .N), by=  occ2012]

## Choosing occupation
df1 <- df[occ2012 == 0800]

str(df1)

library(ggplot2)

ggplot(df1) +
 aes(x = w) +
 geom_density(adjust = 1L, fill = "#112446") +
 theme_minimal()

## Making a new variable for wage/hour

df1 <- df1[, w := earnwke/uhours]
```
